remarks: Midpoint as a function.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Dec-2019.)
statement:
ismid.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
ismid.d $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
ismid.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
ismid.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
ismid.1 $e |- ( ph -> G TarskiGDim>= 2 ) $.
midf $p |- ( ph -> ( midG ` G ) : ( P X. P ) --> P ) $.
